mapper.select: SELECT FILENAME, FILEREALNAME FROM UPLOAD WHERE 1=1
SELECT DISTINCT sd_nm, sd_cd FROM public."tl_sd";
SELECT sgg_nm, sgg_cd FROM tl_sgg WHERE sgg_nm LIKE CONCAT(#{sido}, '%')
SELECT DISTINCT b.bjd_nm, b.bjd_cd FROM tl_bjd b JOIN tl_sgg c ON b.sgg_cd = c.sgg_cd WHERE c.sgg_nm = #{sgg}

insert.foreach: INSERT INTO nono (yearMonthUse, landLocation, roadLandLocation, sggcd, sidonm, landCode, bun, landclassification, newAddNumber, newRoadCode, newLandCode, usage) VALUES (#{item.sggcd}, #{item.sidonm}, #{item.usage})
